籌.definition: chip (in gambling); token (for counting); ticket; to prepare; to plan; to raise (funds); resource; way; means

籌備.definition: preparations; to get ready for sth

籌募.definition: to raise funds; to collect money

籌商.definition: to discuss (a plan); to negotiate (an outcome)

籌思.definition: to ponder a solution; to consider (the best move, how to find a way etc)

籌拍.definition: to prepare to film; to plan a shoot

籌畫.definition: variant of 籌劃|筹划[chou2 hua4]

籌碼.definition: bargaining chip; gaming chip; casino token

籌算.definition: to calculate (using bamboo tokens on a counting board); to count beads; (fig.) to budget; to plan (an investment)

籌謀.definition: to work out a strategy; to come up with a plan for

籌集.definition: to collect money; to raise funds

籌馬.definition: variant of 籌碼|筹码[chou2 ma3]
